name: Ori, Ochi, Onoe.
description:
"submission"

Yoshiyuki left everything behind to start a new life. Moving to the far away Shinrin City, everything is new. All is so calm, and so pure. Several years later however, the situation is very different.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2006-08-10. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The character art and the event scenes were done by ButtercupSaiyan. Backgrounds were done by Kathryn. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Music was composed by Renesis. Estimated completion time is 1,5 hours.

Ori, Ochi, Onoe. is game Nr. 10 of the Original 22.
